instruction:
I want to open the developler tools in chrome with ctrl + shift + i on this website: https://mnsw.pro/
It doesnt work. works on other websites. even here. what is wrong?
output:
It seems that the website you're trying to access has disabled the ability to open the developer tools using the shortcut Ctrl + Shift + I. This is a security measure taken by some websites to prevent unauthorized access to their code and resources.

To access the developer tools on this website, you can try the following:

1. Right-click on the page and select "Inspect" from the context menu. This will open the developer tools.
2. Alternatively, you can try pressing F12 on your keyboard to open the developer tools directly.

If neither of these methods work, it's likely that the website has completely disabled access to the developer tools. In this case, you may need to contact the website's owner or developer to request access.
